channel.title: Welcome and take your time. 欢迎，请便。 on Yong Li 李泳
channel.description: Recent content in Welcome and take your time. 欢迎，请便。 on Yong Li 李泳

item.title: Solving LeetCode Problem 2090 - K Radius Subarray Averages
item.description: In this post, we will solve problem 2090 from LeetCode titled “K Radius Subarray Averages”. This problem provides an interesting use case of prefix sum arrays in handling subarray sum related problems.

item.title: Understanding Kubernetes Watch Mechanism, HTTP Long Polling, and Chunked Transfer Encoding
item.description: Kubernetes (K8s) is an open-source platform for managing containerized workloads and services. One of the core concepts of Kubernetes is the “watch” mechanism used by its controllers.

item.title: Solving the 'exec /bin/sh: exec format error' with Multi-Architecture Docker Builds
item.description: Introduction In the world of containers and microservices, Docker is a popular tool for packaging applications along with their dependencies.

item.title: LeetCode 2466: Count Ways To Build Good Strings
item.description: Introduction In this post, I am going to share my solution for the LeetCode problem 2466: Count Ways to Build Good Strings.

item.title: LeetCode 2140: Solving Questions With Brainpower
item.description: In this post, we will solve LeetCode problem 2140, titled “Solving Questions With Brainpower”. This problem is a great example of applying dynamic programming to a practical scenario.

item.title: Kubernetes: Understanding Jobs and CronJobs
item.description: In Kubernetes, we often have pods that are meant to run indefinitely. However, there are scenarios where we need to run a specific task and exit, like a database migration.

item.title: Adding a Read Time Estimation to Your Hugo Blog Posts
item.description: In this blog post, we’re going to learn how to add a read time estimation to your Hugo blog posts.

item.title: Kubernetes: Understanding ConfigMaps and Secrets
item.description: Today we dive deeper into the world of Kubernetes, specifically focusing on two essential resources: ConfigMaps and Secrets.

item.title: LeetCode 54: Spiral Matrix Solution
item.description: Problem: LeetCode 54: Spiral Matrix Given a matrix of m x n elements (m rows, n columns), return all elements of the matrix in spiral order.

item.title: The Importance of Effect Size in A/B Testing
item.description: In the world of data analysis and A/B testing, understanding the concept of effect size is critical.

item.title: Kubernetes: Understanding Pods, Deployments, and Probes
item.description: In this blog post, we’ll explore some of the key concepts in Kubernetes, such as Pods, Deployments, and Probes.

item.title: Kubernetes: Understanding Services and Ingress
item.description: Introduction to Kubernetes Services In Kubernetes, Pods are ephemeral and can be terminated and created dynamically.

item.title: LeetCode 1572: Matrix Diagonal Sum with Python
item.description: Introduction In this blog post, we’ll discuss a problem from LeetCode called Matrix Diagonal Sum (Problem 1572).

item.title: Fixing CORS Issues on a GitHub Pages-hosted Hugo Site
item.description: Recently, I encountered a CORS issue with my personal blog site hosted on GitHub Pages with Hugo.

item.title: How to Add Utterances Comments Widget to Your Hugo Blog
item.description: In this blog post, we’ll walk through the steps to add the Utterances comments widget to your Hugo-based GitHub Pages site.

item.title: LeetCode 1964: Find the Longest Valid Obstacle Course at Each Position
item.description: In this blog post, we’ll discuss how to solve LeetCode problem 1964: Find the Longest Valid Obstacle Course at Each Position.

item.title: Fixing Avatar Image Path Issue in Hugo Themes
item.description: Have you ever encountered an issue with Hugo themes where an image (such as an avatar) isn’t being displayed correctly, even though the path appears to be correct in the config.
